results.definition: get involved, so as to alter or hinder an action, or through force or threat of force
examples: Why did the U.S. not intervene earlier in WW II?

results.definition: be placed or located between other things or extend between spaces and events
examples: This interludes intervenes between the two movements

results.definition: occur between other event or between certain points of time
examples: the war intervened between the birth of her two children
